content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

If you’re looking for an outstanding web development company in Melbourne, you've just found what you’re looking for. Confetti Design has more than 5 years of experience and satisfied clients across different lines of business in Melbourne. This proves our dedication and expertise in the small business website design field. We don’t just design websites. We understand the business you’re in, its customers, and how to make your website perform to your business’s advantage.

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Our Melbourne web design services

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563612505951{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

From designing your ecommerce website to developing a brand that sells, we have all your web design service needs to help you succeed in your business.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563763719176{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

7 Reasons to choose Confetti Design for your professional web design Melbourne

[vc_column_text]

There is a huge difference on how websites appear 5 years ago than how they appear now. Before, their mere function is to have online presence; but now, all sorts of functionalities that are user friendly for both website owners and page visitors are present in the pages. Your website design should not only be beautifully made but also functional. That way, you’ll have the chance to outrank your competitors.

Confetti Design compiled seven of the most important elements of a web design that we use to ensure your site connects with your target audience and helps increase website visitors from Melbourne or anywhere in Australia.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

These elements are all in Confetti Designs standards. If you are thinking of a website development company in Melbourne who knows the ins and outs of the best web designs, you’ve come to the right place. May it be for your wordpress website design or you’re looking for a professional website development, Confetti Design has it all!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608564696{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564474552919{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Impactful color schemes

Colors bring life to your website, and they could make or break your web design. If you are just starting with your small business web design, deciding on the color scheme will be a crucial step. This is because this color scheme will be used throughout your branding and your Melbourne website.

Use only a few colors that can make your website look balanced. Combine warm and cool hues so that it will not look overwhelming.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608572404{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564474580047{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Simple navigation menu

Keeping your navigation menu as simple as possible will invite more website clicks—even for those who are not tech savvy. Keep the menu functional but simple, around 5-7 menu item is ideal if you are aiming for a professional web design look.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608578524{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564474617169{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Distinct typography

One of the main reasons why a visitor will leave your website is because the texts are hard to read. Choose a unique typography with large font so that people will easily understand your content. Just like with colors, choose your typography carefully as you will be using this throughout your website and with your branding materials of your ecommerce web design as well as in your Melbourne store marketing materials.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608585353{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/steps_04aaa.jpg?id=11317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564474642375{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Engaging hero images

Your hero images should be appealing enough for your website visitors to be intrigued by it and would want to see more. These are huge banner images that has a bit of text. Ensure that your hero images are enticing! Aside from appealing hero images, you also must make sure that these images are responsive in all devices.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563613170110{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/confetti-design-business-essentials-set-up.jpg?id=10900) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564474669064{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Mobile friendly

As stated in #4, making sure your images are mobile friendly, as well as the rest of your website. More and more people are using their mobile phones to browse different online stores or websites. Therefore, your ecommerce website design should allow your users to browse and buy products with ease from their mobile phones.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563613196313{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_06.jpg?id=10892) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564474703504{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Appealing product images and descriptions

If you are selling products and looking to have the best e-commerce website design, then you should consider having appealing, high-resolution images for your products. Present them in a way that your visitors would be wanting to click that buy now button from your Melbourne e-commerce website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563849763668{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Confetti-Design-Melbourne-Website-SEO.jpg?id=12945) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564474736470{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Website search engine optimisation

Your ultimate goal is for your website to have the greatest number of visitors and sales for ecommerce websites compared to your rival sites, and you can only do this if you are ranking higher in search engine results pages. Optimisation of your website should always consider the end user experience—that is, your website should be user friendly. You should also optimise your website so that visitors can easily find your physical store in Melbourne, if you have one.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563763684288{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563594954959{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563594962893{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563763430518{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
